Name: New Syrtis
Details: First settled in 2260, New Syrtis is a world permanently frozen that contain vast mineral resources underneath its snow and ice, with only the equatorial areas being habitable. The world is the regional capital of the Capellan March of the Armed Forces of the Federated Suns and contains a large garrison of several BattleMech regiments. The current Duke of New Syrtis is Michael Hasek-Davion, brother in law to the ruler of the Federated Suns, Hanse Davion.
